result.execSummary:
The defendant Eric L Slove was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Eric L Slove is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Eric L Slove was found guilty of Attempt Capture an Image of Nudity, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 942.09(2)(am)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Probation may be served in Brown Co.

miscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.  This applies to all counts and financial obligations.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.  Participate in counseling deemed appropriate by your agent, which may include: alcohol/drug, anger management/DV counseling, psychiatric/psychological, AODA Assessment and follow-through with recommended treatment.
*   Pay fine of $300 and court costs including all applicable surcharges.
  May not have contact with MKB (dob 4/2/97), unless otherwise permitted by the court/agent.  May be served in Brown Co.

Attorney Jason Zapf appeared for the State.  DE appears in person with Atty Fred Zievers. Victim's mother present.  Clerk P. Scypta.

Court orders withheld sentence; defendant placed on probation for 1 year w/conditions. Court orders a $300 fine. Court costs ordered.  No restitution requested. Appeal rights given.  (ps 1/5/16)

No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
